name: NEDRY
description:
This build represents about 25 hours of work rushing to put something together for shacknews.com spring game jam.   Based on one of my favorite Apple ][ games from way back when.

Made with UE 4.27.

Saturday April 1 update:  

3 levels now.

Lots of bug fixes.

More spiders and snakes with each new level.

Controller support.

and .. other stuff I can't remember.

Sunday April 2 update (final ver)

Added 2d player character.
